The Books of Summer 2014

Posted on September 3, 2014 by Christy Pastore — 3 Comments ↓

First, cue up this song, “The Boys of Summer” by Don Henley. Next grab your favorite summer beverage. I have selected a white wine – pinot grigio.

I have told you all about a few of my favorite Indie reads in the past few months. You can find those under my Frisky Friday Book Recommendations.

Here are a few books that are currently on my To Be Read List. Scoop of these titles, and the summer fun will never end!

“Love With Every Beat” by K.L. Shandwick – This book is told from heartthrob rocker Alfie Black’s  point of view. If you haven’t read “The Everything Trilogy” you might want to dive into that one before moving on to this book.

“One Last Kiss” by Susan Ward – Amazon Best Selling Author, Susan Ward weaves together another steamy story set in the seaside paradise of Santa Barbara. Linda is searching for closure and Jackson is searching for peace. Two broken souls collide together in a passionate love affair that changes their lives forever.

 

“Evelyn” by Tracie Podger – This novella is part of the “Fallen Angel” Series but can be read as a stand alone. The first line of the synopsis has me pulled in, “Evelyn was sixteen years old when she fell in love. She fell in love with a murderer.” Cannot wait to read this book!

 

BONUS: On the I am obsessed with this book{s} list we have: “Reasonable Doubt” Series by Whitney Gracia Williams – Step one, Meet Andrew Hamilton, the king of hot and cold. He is hot. He is a naughty, naughty man, and you will love every dirty word that passes through his beautiful lips.

 

Well that is my list! Hope you will all add these fantastic reads to your bookshelves. While you’re at it, don’t forget to pick up your copy of my debut novel, “Fifteen Weekends”. Keep an eye out for my upcoming novel, “Unscripted” arriving December 9th, 2014.
